data.name: Half-Life: A Place in the West Soundtrack Vol 2
data.detailed_description:
The second volume of the A Place in the West soundtrack covers chapters 3 - 5 of the comic, and features 9 original pieces of ambient and instrumental music created by Chris Jolley. In addition to the previous soundtrack, Chris's previous credits as an audio engineer / composer include games such as Assassin's Creed Chronicles (China, Russia, and India), Runescape, Bloodforge, Harry Potter & The Deathly Hallows (I & II), and Silent Hill: Shattered Memories.

Track Listing
1) The City Dreams (3:55)
2) Kempinski and the Abyss (5:04)
3) The Pit (5:21)
4) Dr Cloven (3:48)
5) The Opposition (3:25)
6) Checkpoint Alpha (4:30)
7) The Abyss Stares Back (4:50)
8) Control (Long & Sejal) (4:42)
9) The Scientist & The Artist (Leyla & Hadley) (3:27)

All files are in MP3 format (at 192kbs), and will be downloaded to your Half-Life: A Place in the West folder in the Steam Directory ../Steam/steamapps/common/Half-Life: A Place in the West/Soundtrack
